---
title: "Heatmap"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(bio3d)
fasta = read.fasta("aln-fasta.txt")
seqid = seqidentity(fasta)
library(gplots)
heatmap.2(seqid, dendrogram = "both", col = rev(colorRampPalette(c("yellow","orange", "red"))(100)), trace = "none", margins = c(10, 10), cexCol = 0.9, cexRow = 0.9, labRow = fasta$id, labCol = fasta$id)
```
